 number of DLLs in the group.

 total number of classes implemented in all DLLs in the group.

flyClassDesc** cd
 list of all classes from all the DLLs in the group.

Detailed Description

DLLs grouping class.

This class implements a group of Fly3D plugin DLLs. Each DLL can enumerate any number of flyBspObject derived classes.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
